metadata.othernotes:
Summary
- Young fighter pilot for a spacecraft. Subteam leader/second-in-command under Meia; pilots are around their age (high school/college).
- Pirate crew. ~100-150 women, 3 male prisoners.
- Home planet Mejare, Earth colony. Population is all female. Women form couples and families there.
- Mejare is at war with neighboring planet, all-male Tarak. Each does not see the other sex as human.
- Other colonies exist with other societies. Earth has been attacking colonies to harvest colonists' organs.
- Probably wealthy as a child, like many of her crewmates.
- Also among the pilot team is her girlfriend, Barnette Orangello (18 years old). Despite not always sharing interests, Jura and Barnette are often attached at the hip and haunt the ship's halls together. Barnette likes to collect antique guns--that is to say, modern guns. She often captures Jura's showmanship on film, at her behest.

Personality
- Vain and self-absorbed. Carefully maintains her appearance. Wants attention for her size, beauty, and power (as a fighter pilot).
- Beautiful and she knows it. Feels "you don't lose anything by being seen," and loves to be admired.
- Loves anything she perceives as "elegant" or powerful, including imagined scenarios.
- Liable to whine and complain when things don't go her way or as she envisioned.
- Very open with her feelings, announcing interest and voicing displeasure. Heaps physical affection onto people she likes. Considers her embrace a reward unto itself.
- Not afraid to flirt or flex her looks to get what she wants.
- DOES take her job seriously, despite her high-strung attitude. Worries about cracking under pressure or failing to live up to expectations. Lacks leadership experience.
- Sensitive beneath her bluster. Often lets the more tenacious Barnette take charge in dangerous situations.
- Brought a sidearm, her rapier. Has reservations about Earthlings' trustworthiness.
- "When I want something, I do it." Willing to insert herself into others' social lives and fix their problems, either by announcing them directly or hatching schemes. Can be quite supportive in this way.
- Wants to learn more about men. Believes becoming pregnant by a man's seed--the first Mejarian to do so--will make her famous. Sex with men is a separate but also fascinating prospect. She has not realized the connection between these things.
- Attracted to other girls, obviously. Has a reputation for taking initiative in this regard.

Good Topics/Touchstones
- Men's anatomy/physiology/behavior/desires (e.g. no periods, they like big breasts)
- Male/female relationships, experience (e.g. Jura has no concept of birth control)
- any flight/space travel/combat experience or technology unique to your character's setting
- beauty, fashion, and body image
- pregnancy/marriage/family
- diet/exercise/combat training, especially swordplay
- info about Earth
- positive F/F relationships/interest
- general questions about Mejare, her rank, ship, crew, etc. (anything that lets her brag about herself)

Bad/Overdone Topics
- "How do two women make babies?" Gene splicing. Normal pregnancy.
- "Your sword/dress/clothes are really advanced!" They're not, even by our standards.
- "omg u r an alien" She's a human.
- Don't treat her like a loredump machine. Ask something that your character would have an opinion on the answer to.
- her past (there's not much canon info)

case.name: Mahiru/Natsuki Selfie
case.description: Jura smushes Natsuki between her breasts, dragging her into a selfie with Mahiru.

case.name: Amalia Flower Gift
case.description: Amalia gives Jura some flowers for not complaining about her covering herself.

trigger.state: Hm? Omigosh, Amalia, thank you so much! You're such a sweet little green bean!
Are you serious, Amalia? Oh! Omigosh! They're so pretty! I don't see enough flowers!
Ooh, Amalia, thank you! I'm sorry if I called you haughty! Flowers are so romantic!
Omigosh! Omigosh, thank you, honey! You're sweet for a princess--I need to give these to Barnette!
Ooh! This is going right in my hair! Thank you, Miss Princess, and tell your kingdom Mejare says hi!

case.name: Seduction-1
case.description: Jura asks the table how to seduce men. This is the normal (Jura-only) version of this prompt--please prioritize responding to it.

case.name: Seduction-2
case.description: On an all-female table, Jura asks how to seduce an Earth woman.

case.name: Seduction-3
case.description: Jura asks an all-male table how to seduce men.

case.name: Tharja Shrink
case.description: Tharja magically shrinks Jura's breasts, leaving her shocked and livid. This is the normal (Jura-only) version of this prompt--please prioritize responding to it.

case.name: Tharja Sword
case.description: Furious at having her breasts shrunk, Jura comes after Tharja with her rapier.

case.name: Tharja Fix
case.description: Tharja returns Jura's breasts to their normal size, so she calms down and nestles them, relieved. This is the normal (Jura-only) version of this prompt--please prioritize responding to it.

case.name: Birthday
case.description: On August 31st, Jura proudly exclaims that it's her birthday.

case.name: Revy Grope
case.description: Revy inspects Jura's breasts for fake-ness herself by groping them.

case.name: Natsuki Motorboat
case.description: Jura smushes Natsuki between her breasts.

case.name: Meia Dual Masturbation
case.description: Jura takes it upon herself to help with Meia's masturbation.

case.name: Butt (Thong)
case.description: Jura shows off her butt, still in her thong, teasing the table about how she's gone a while without losing.

case.name: Butt (Nude)
case.description: Jura shows off her nude butt, teasing the table about how she's still in the game.

case.name: Babies
case.description: Jura describes how she wants to have a baby soon and asks her tablemates if any of them are interested in having children of their own.

markers.marker: Jura acknowledges that the game has come down to her and one other player.
On August 31st, Jura proudly exclaims that it's her birthday--or gets Meia to do so, if she's there.
Jura turns around to display her butt, and how her hair covers most of it.
Jura speaks into her personal communicator, usually to contact Meia when she's at another table.
Jura thinks it's adorable how Dust is a shier man than she and Meia are used to working with,
Jura explains to Dust how women love making personal statements with their fashion choices.
Jura mentions Famas and/or Omas, the women who splice their eggs together on planet Mejare to have children.
Jura greets the female player the first time she strips.
Jura relaxes for a moment after masturbating.
"My, aren't you an arrogant little thing? Or perhaps that's just the face you put on when the whip comes out."
Jura tells Jessie that Meia really came to the game with her to see men naked, despite Meia's claims that it's for security.
Jura comments that Zone shouldn't be having trouble telling her and Jin apart.
Jura thinks Korra's reluctance to talk about her girlfriend is silly when she's willing to get naked in public.
Jura greets the male player the first time he strips.
On June 10th, Jura excitedly tells the table that it's Meia's birthday.
Jura thinks Meia's idea to go sightseeing on Earth is great, and that they should fly around it in their Dreads.
Jura thinks Meia shouldn't worry about the size of men's penises since Earth women seem to enjoy them.
Jura is dumbfounded by Meia's apparent streetfighting experience.
Jura takes it upon herself to make Meia remember the woman's touch.
Jura asks Nagisa if Earth women allow men to shove their "tubes" into them regularly.
Jura muses about Natsuki telling her to write Barnette a poem.
Jura smushes Natsuki between her breasts.
Jura tells Nayru that Meia tends to relax the more naked she is.
Jura misinterprets an Earth nation as an entire planet.
Jura teases Raven over trying to remain focused around her.
Revy takes it upon herself to determine whether Jura's breasts are real.

Furious that Tharja shrank her breasts, Jura comes after her with her rapier.

Jura angrily tries to push past the dealer and get to Tharja as everyone is given new cards.
Jura teases that she isn't wearing any underwear...even though she is.
